solution_line_template: If 1/{share_fraction_denominator} of the man's lot is equal to ${amount_sold_for}, then the man's land is worth ${amount_sold_for} x {share_fraction_denominator} = $<<{amount_sold_for}*{share_fraction_denominator}={mans_share_worth}>>{mans_share_worth}.

Since 1/{whole_lot_fraction_denominator} of the whole lot is worth ${mans_share_worth}, then the whole lot is worth ${mans_share_worth} x {whole_lot_fraction_denominator} = $<<{mans_share_worth}*{whole_lot_fraction_denominator}={entire_lot_worth}>>{entire_lot_worth}.
